TopicTitle: RSS Planets Freeze Loading w/ Active Texture Management

Articles.Content:
I am trying to play RO with active texture management. I am using 32 bit KSP, blah blah blah all the usual fixes, but I get this problem with KSP freezing while trying to load RSS planets. Sometimes it crashes. I have read the Active texture management thread and I know that it is supposed to crash but it has done this ~20 times. Sometimes I get to loading 8/17, then it crashes, but the next time it freezes at 6/17. note that when I say freezes, I do not mean that KSP freezes, but rather the loading of the RSS textures and planetary editing freezes. The little kerbal in the corner still looks around and the planet in the top still spins.

Anyone got any ideas?

BTW all my mods are up to date and are installed via CKAN

Edited January 31, 2015 by HexYZAsh
Fixed

Without a log (please see the sticky in this forum....) I can't say for certain, but I'm betting you're running out of memory.

Try with a lower-rez texture pack for RSS, and/or fewer part packs, and/or OpenGL mode, and/or higher ATM compression.
